description: This is a React component file that implements the front-end of a Tic Tac Toe game, including UI rendering, game state management, and user interactions.

methods.name: App()
methods.description: Main React functional component for Tic Tac Toe game UI and logic.

methods.name: handleCellClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on board cells, updates game state.

methods.name: handleRestart
methods.description: Resets the game to initial state.

methods.name: getCellAriaLabel
methods.description: Provides ARIA label for each cell for accessibility.
